about.title: About me
about.content1: I am a professional Social Worker who has been working for over 20 years, and I am as passionate about this profession, as I was when I started in this field.
about.content2: My clinical approach is client centered, offered in a laid back, nonjudgmental and relaxed atmosphere.  I will provide you with a warm support, professional and rigorous services.  My clinical years of experience enables me to accompany and focus on my clients’ needs with active listening and respect. My objective is to provide you with concrete tools that are readily accessible.
about.content3: Over the years of my practice, I have developed a broad range of expertise related to adoption, attachment, family dynamics and relationships.

footer.address: 5777 Boulevard Gouin Ouest, Montreal, QC, Canada, H4J 1E3

home.name: Social Worker
home.description: I am an experienced social worker offering psychosocial services to families in the greater Montreal area. I offer workshops on adoption and attachment throughout the regions of Quebec. Please feel free to contact me; it will be a pleasure to work with you.

landing.frDescription: Si vous désirez accéder à ce site en Français, veuillez cliquer sur ce bouton.
landing.enDescription: If you want to access the website in English, please click the following button.
